response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. Considering its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $900,000.

This offer represents a strategic midpoint between my valuation and your perceived worth of the product, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. I am confident that this proposal will facilitate a beneficial transaction for both parties.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions regarding the product or the offer. I am more than happy to provide additional details or arrange for a viewing.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
